data.text: @philipnolan1 Hate baths in bedrooms or those doorless bathrooms. I don't care how well you know someone, there is a need for privacy sometimes!
@philipnolan1 Are you telling us you brought it home?? 🤔 'Fess up Phillip...
@philipnolan1 Ah yes ok right on the southern edge of the Cotswolds. I live just north of the Cotswolds, lovely area 😍
@BootleBee No, a place called Southrop, about 40km from Broadway. https://t.co/Qvh8Whd8fv
@philipnolan1 Lovely where was that Phil, Broadway?
@philipnolan1 We had just flown home from Spain. In my naivety I thought it would be sorted in weeks. I thought we would be back in our Spanish home by April. Now hoping for this coming April.

@bill46130510 @philipnolan1 Was in Budapest the week that it broke here 
 Sensed something was coming
Didn’t use the metro ETC 

There was one person wearing a mask on the flight home 😀
@philipnolan1 Keep good memories and remember the good things.  It will be ok ☘️

@philipnolan1 This time two years ago I still believed I was going to a wedding in Italy in June 😏
It’s rebooked for this June,so 🤞🏻🤞🏻🤞🏻🤞🏻
